mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('表结构不一致 tbName:',tb_name,' 期望字段:',exp_columns,' 数据库中字段:',db_columns) as msg FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*)= 2 as fg,'table1' as tb_name,group_concat(COLUMN_NAME) db_columns, 'ID,CARD' exp_columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'table1' AND COLUMN_NAME in('ID','CARD') GROUP BY TABLE_NAME )a WHERE fg=0
